name: kanbanbrawn-master
description: Bugs: Editing a created task to have more points doesn't increase your current points Proposals:

scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "cd server && npm start" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.postinstall: npm i --prefix server && npm run build --prefix client
scripts.gen: npm run graphql-gen --prefix server && npm run graphql-gen --prefix client
